chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
l1 \\-> init_dstatelet1 \In Coh W1

Premises:
Coh = fun (w : world) (s : state) => [/\ valid w, valid s, hook_complete w, dom (cT:=union_mapUMC Label protocol) w.1 =i dom (cT:=union_mapUMC Label dstatelet) s & forall l : Label, coh (getProtocol w l) (getStatelet s l)] : world -> Pred state
Notation W1 := (mkWorld cal1)
Notation init_dstatelet1 := {| dstate := init_dstate1; dsoup := Unit |}
l1 = 1 : nat
init_state = l1 \\ -> init_dstatelet1 \+ l2 \\ -> init_dstatelet2 : state
projectS_cohL : forall (W1 W2 : prodPCM (union_mapPCM Label protocol) (union_mapPCM hook_domain hook_type)) (s : state), s \In Coh (W1 \+ W2) -> hook_complete W1 -> projectS W1 s \In Coh W1
cohUnKR : forall (U W : prodPCM (union_mapPCM Label protocol) (union_mapPCM hook_domain hook_type)) (s s' : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet), s \+ s' \In Coh (U \+ W) -> s \In Coh U -> hook_complete W -> s' \In Coh W
coh_hooks : forall (U : world) (K : union_mapPCM hook_domain hook_type) (s : state), s \In Coh (U \+ (Unit, K)) -> s \In Coh U
projectS_cohR : forall (W1 W2 : prodPCM (union_mapPCM Label protocol) (union_mapPCM hook_domain hook_type)) (s : state), s \In Coh (W1 \+ W2) -> hook_complete W2 -> projectS W2 s \In Coh W2
with_inv_coh : forall (pr : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (ii : InductiveInv pr I) (s : state), s \In Coh (mkWorld (ProtocolWithInvariant.ProtocolWithIndInv ii)) -> s \In Coh (mkWorld pr)
V = W1 \+ W2 : prodPCM (union_mapPCM Label protocol) (union_mapPCM hook_domain hook_type)
pstep_inv : forall (this : nid) (A : Type) (pr : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (ii : InductiveInv pr I) (s1 s2 : state) (sc : schedule) (t t' : proc this (mkWorld pr) A), s1 \In Coh (mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii)) -> pstep s1 t sc s2 t' -> s2 \In Coh (mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii))
init_dstate2 = sv \\ -> init_loc \+ sd \\ -> init_loc : union_map_classPCM (union_mapUMC nat_ordType heapUMC)
init_dstate1 = sv \\ -> init_loc \+ cl \\ -> init_loc : union_map_classPCM (union_mapUMC nat_ordType heapUMC)
coh1' = conj (And4 (conj ((fun _evar_0_ : true => eq_ind_r [eta is_true] _evar_0_ (valid_unit (union_map_classPCM (union_mapUMC mid (msg TaggedMessage))))) is_true_true) (fun (m : mid) (ms : msg TaggedMessage) => (fun _evar_0_ : None = Some ms -> cohMsg prec cs1 cls1 ms => eq_ind_r (fun _pattern_value_ : option (msg TaggedMessage) => _pattern_value_ = Some ms -> cohMsg prec cs1 cls1 ms) _evar_0_ (find0E (union_mapUMC mid (msg TaggedMessage)) m)) (fun H : None = Some ms => let H0 : False := eq_ind None (fun e : option (msg TaggedMessage) => match e with | Some _ => False | None => True end) I (Some ms) H in False_ind (cohMsg prec cs1 cls1 ms) H0))) (fun z : [ordType of nid] => (fun _evar_0_ :...
aft_ind_inv : forall (pr : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (ii : InductiveInv pr I) (A : Type) (this : nid) (p : proc this (mkWorld pr) A) (P : A -> state -> Prop) (i : state), i \In Coh (mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii)) -> after i p P -> after i (WithInv pr I ii (erefl (mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii))) p) (fun (v : A) (m : state) => m \In Coh (mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii)) /\ P v m)
alw_coh : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc this W A) (P : state -> proc this W A -> Prop), always s p P -> s \In Coh W
hooks_frame : forall (U W : world) (K : hooks) (l : Label) (st : nat_ordType) (s : union_mapUMC Label dstatelet) (s' : union_map_classPCM (union_mapUMC Label dstatelet)) (n : nid) (msg : Exports.input) (to : nid), hook_complete U -> hook_complete W -> hooks_consistent (U \+ W).1 K -> l \in dom (cT:=union_mapUMC Label dstatelet) s -> s \In Coh U -> s \+ s' \In Coh (U \+ W \+ (Unit, K)) -> not_hooked_by K l -> all_hooks_fire U l st s n msg to -> all_hooks_fire (U \+ W \+ (Unit, K)) l st (s \+ s') n msg to
with_inv_step : forall (pr : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (ii : InductiveInv pr I) (z : nid) (s1 s2 : state), s1 \In Coh (mkWorld (ProtocolWithInvariant.ProtocolWithIndInv ii)) -> network_step (mkWorld pr) z s1 s2 -> network_step (mkWorld (ProtocolWithInvariant.ProtocolWithIndInv ii)) z s1 s2
mkWorld = fun p : protocol => (plab p \\-> p, Unit) : protocol -> world
valid_init_dstate1 = (fun (_evar_0_ : forall i : ~~ valid (sv \\-> init_loc), (fun b : bool => fun=> b) false (valid_false1 (U:=union_mapUMC nat_ordType heapUMC) (f1:=sv \\-> init_loc) (cl \\-> init_loc) i)) (_evar_0_0 : forall i : ~~ valid (cl \\-> init_loc), (fun b : bool => fun=> b) false (valid_false2 (U:=union_mapUMC nat_ordType heapUMC) (sv \\-> init_loc) (f2:=cl \\-> init_loc) i)) (_evar_0_1 : forall (k : nat_ordType) (i : k \in dom (cT:=union_mapUMC nat_ordType heapUMC) (sv \\-> init_loc)) (i0 : k \in dom (cT:=union_mapUMC nat_ordType heapUMC) (cl \\-> init_loc)), (fun b : bool => fun=> b) false (valid_false3 (U:=union_mapUMC nat_ordType heap...
alw_ind_inv : forall (pr : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (ii : InductiveInv pr I) (A : Type) (this : nid) (p : proc this (mkWorld pr) A) (P : state -> proc this (mkWorld pr) A -> Prop) (i : state), i \In Coh (mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii)) -> always i p P -> always i (WithInv pr I ii (erefl (mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii))) p) (fun (m : state) (q : proc this (mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii)) A) => m \In Coh (mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii)) /\ ((exists q' : proc this (mkWorld pr) A, q = WithInv pr I ii (erefl (mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii))) q' /\ P m q') \/ (exists v' : A, q = Ret v' /\ P m (Ret v'))))
alw_ret' : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s1 : state) (v : A) (scs : seq schedule) (P : state -> proc this W A -> Prop), s1 \In Coh W -> (forall s2 : state, network_rely W this s1 s2 -> P s2 (Ret v)) -> always_sc s1 (Ret v) scs P
stepWithInv : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (pr : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (ii : InductiveInv pr I) (s1 : state) (t : proc this (mkWorld pr) A) (sc : schedule) (s2 : state) (q : proc this W A) (pf : W = mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii)), pstep s1 (WithInv pr I ii pf t) sc s2 q < -> (exists v : A, [/\ sc = WithInvRet, t = Ret v, q = Ret v, s2 = s1, s1 \In Coh W & W = mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii)]) \/ (exists (sc' : schedule) (t' : proc this (mkWorld pr) A), [/\ sc = WithInvStep sc', q = WithInv pr I ii pf t', W = mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii), s1 \In Coh W & pstep s1 t sc' s2 t'])
alw_imp : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc this W A) (P1 P2 : state -> proc this W A -> Prop), (forall (s0 : state) (p0 : proc this W A), s0 \In Coh W -> P1 s0 p0 -> P2 s0 p0) -> always s p P1 -> always s p P2
post_msg = fun (s : soup) (m : msg TaggedMessage) => (s \+ fresh s \\-> m, fresh s) : soup -> msg TaggedMessage -> soup * mid
step_coh : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state), network_step w this s1 s2 -> Coh w s1 /\ Coh w s2
rely_coh : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state), network_rely w this s1 s2 -> Coh w s1 /\ Coh w s2
empty_lstate = fix empty_lstate (ns : seq nid) : union_map_classPCM (union_mapUMC nat_ordType heap) := match ns with | [::] => Unit | n :: ns' => n \\ -> Heap.empty \+ empty_lstate ns' end : seq nid -> union_map_classPCM (union_mapUMC nat_ordType heap) Arguments empty_lstate _%seq_scope
cohS : forall (w : world) (s : state), Coh w s -> valid s
cohW : forall (w : world) (s : state), Coh w s -> valid w
network_step_ind : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (P : Prop), (s1 \In Coh w /\ s1 = s2 -> P) ->...-> P
network_step_sind : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (P : SProp), (s1 \In Coh w /\ s1 = s2 -> P) ->...-> P
coh_s : forall (w : world) (l : Label) (s : state), Coh w s -> coh (getProtocol w l) (getStatelet s l)
cohD : forall (w : world) (s : state), Coh w s -> dom (cT:=union_mapUMC Label protocol) w =i dom (cT:=union_mapUMC Label dstatelet) s
Inductive network_step (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) : Prop := Idle : s1 \In Coh w /\ s1 = s2 -> network_step w this s1 s2 | SendMsg : forall (l : Label) (st : send_trans (nodes:=Protocols.nodes (getProtocol w l)) (Protocols.coh (getProtocol w l))), st \In get_st w l -> forall (to : nid) (msg : Exports.input) (b : heap), this \in nodes (getProtocol w l) (getStatelet s1 l) -> l \in dom (cT:=union_mapUMC Label dstatelet) s1 -> Coh w s1 ->...-> network_step w this s1 s2 Arguments Idle [w] _ [s1 s2] Arguments SendMsg [w this s1 s2 l st] _ [to] [msg]%seq_scope [b] _ _ _ [S] Arguments ReceiveMsg [w this s1 s2 l rt] _ [i] [from]%nat_scope [pf] _ [C msg0]
Actions.tryrecv_act_step = fun (W : world) (this : nid) (filter : Label -> nid -> nat -> pred Exports.input) (s1 s2 : state) (r : option (nid * nat * Exports.input)) => exists pf : s1 \In Coh W, [/\ forall (l : Label) (m : mid) (tms : TaggedMessage) (from : nat) (rt : receive_trans (nodes:=Protocols.nodes (getProtocol W l)) (Protocols.coh (getProtocol W l))) (b : bool), this \in nodes (getProtocol W l) (getStatelet s1 l) -> Some {| content := tms; from := from; to := this; active := b |} = find (cT:=union_mapUMC mid (msg TaggedMessage)) m (dsoup (getStatelet s1 l)) -> rt \In rcv_trans (getProtocol W l) -> tag tms = t_rcv rt ->...-> Prop Arguments Actions.tryrecv_act_step _ _ _%function_scope
CalcInv = fun (l : Label) (f : Exports.input -> option nat) (prec : Exports.input -> bool) (cs cls : seq nid) (d : dstatelet) => coh (Exports.CalculatorProtocol f prec cs cls l) d -> forall (n to : nat_eqType) (v : nat) (args : Exports.input) (i : mid) (s' : union_map_classPCM (union_mapUMC mid (msg TaggedMessage))), n \in cls -> to \in cs -> dsoup d = i \\ -> {| content := {| tag := Exports.resp; tms_cont := v :: args |}; from := to; to := n; active := true |} \+ s' -> f args = Some v : Label -> (Exports.input -> option nat) -> (Exports.input -> bool) -> seq nid -> seq nid -> dstatelet -> Prop Arguments CalcInv _ (_ _)%function_scope (_ _)%seq_scope
msg_wf : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), Transitions.receive_trans (nodes:=nodes) coh -> forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool
Msg : forall mtype : Type, mtype -> nat -> nat -> bool -> msg mtype
And5 : forall P1 P2 P3 P4 P5 : Prop, P1 -> P2 -> P3 -> P4 -> P5 -> [/\ P1, P2, P3, P4 & P5]
ssr_have : forall Plemma Pgoal : Type, Plemma -> (Plemma -> Pgoal) -> Pgoal
injects = Injection.injects : world -> world -> hooks -> Type
soup = union_map mid (msg TaggedMessage) : Type
